songs.title: Hazaar Gallan
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Sochan mae roz navi gallan hazaar nale, hazaar gallan mere zahin te savaar
Mere ton taz meri soch, meri soch ton taz meri zabaan ae mere hathyaar

[Verse 1]
Ratan nu nazar aande, nachde peende gaande
Asi din chi kam vi lakh niptane
Shaher shaher chi galiyan, gali gali chi desi
Jadon vajje Bohemia sonde pardesi asi
Dil dae change, aadetaan kharaab sadhi
Teri khuraak ton meingi ae sharaab sadi
Kalakaar hazaar mere varga ni koi
Teri majaal tu puchda okaat sadhi
Desi munde shaan nal vajaan mere gane
Kale gorean nu shaan nal sunaan mere gane
Pardes chi desiyan di awaaz mere gane jive
Kholde sareyan de raaz mere gane jive
Malcolm X shabazz de gane
Meri koam nu ghulami ton bachaan mere gane jere
Din dihardhe sonde mere log, neend cho loka nu jagaan mere gane
Mere hani, jae tu pardes vich zindigi bitani, yaad rakhin meri ek gal
Aasi doshmanna de nal bae ke torni rotiyan te yaaran uthe rakhni nigah aj kal

[Verse 2]
Sitariyan to vadh ke jahaan ne hor, aje zindigi chi baki imtahaan ne hor
Jado tak si teri rag rag vich khoon, tere uthe samaya bas ek hi janoon
Nah isah peer nah moosah peer, pese de aghe hondi sari duniya faqeer
Takdeer de agge challe kisi da nai zor, to sochda kush hor fir bolda kush hor
Fir karda kakh ake dasda kush hor, mare gallan tu lakh, pale tere nai zor
Asi admi kuch hor sade kolo vadh ke agge nai kuch hor, chadde lokan da dil meri gallan da zor
Mere kol boliyan ne hor tera sina chani mere kol gollian ne hor
Gali gali chi shor, Bohemia de varga likhari nai koi hor maene
Apni kismat nu aap chamkaya, bhang pae gham vach pesa kamaya
Padhea likhaya kuch kam nai aya, lakh chadna mae mangea
Par chad nai mae paya
